example.eg: The cottage is quite isolated: your nearest neighbours are two miles away.
example.egtrans: 这座农舍相当偏远，离最近的邻居也有两英里。

example.eg: It's easy to feel isolated living in a big city.
example.egtrans: 住在大城市里很容易感到孤独。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 孤独的，落落寡和的, 离群索居的

example.eg: A few isolated burglaries have made local residents nervous.
example.egtrans: 几次孤立的盗窃事件让当地居民紧张不安。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 罕见的，孤立的，只出现一次的

example.eg: Paul moved to Montana because he wanted to isolate himself from society. Working from home isolated Serena from society.
example.egtrans: 保罗搬到蒙大拿州是因为他想与世隔绝。在家工作让塞丽娜与社会隔离开来。

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使…孤立，把…隔离开来，使…隔绝

example.eg: Laura worked to isolate the facts from all the crazy stories so that she could write her story.
example.egtrans: 劳拉努力将事实从这些荒唐的故事中分离出来，好写出自己的故事。

example.eg: The customs agent isolated the traveler in medical quarantine for two days because they feared that he was infected.
example.egtrans: 海关关员害怕那位旅行者已受到感染，所以对他进行了两天的医疗隔离。

example.eg: The doctor isolated the smallpox strain that was causing the epidemic.
example.egtrans: 医生分离出了导致瘟疫的天花菌株。

example.eg: The Basque language is an isolate, and doesn't fit into any other language groups.
The electrician had to make sure she isolated the circuits properly to avoid a short circuit.

trans_examp.trans_cn: 使绝缘, 给...做绝缘处理
